data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zaldivar-Riveron, Alejandro, Martinez, Juan Jose, Ceccarelli, Fadia Sara, Shaw, Scott R. (2012): Five new species of the genera Heerz Marsh, Lissopsius Marsh and Ondigus Braet, Barbalho and van Achterberg (Braconidae, Doryctinae) from the Chamela-Cuixmala biosphere reserve in Jalisco, Mexico. ZooKeys 164: 1-23, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.164.2201, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.164.2201
